title: [Seethe Naedal, Rocky Ridge]
description: The softly rounded rocks forming the ridge provide for easier climbing compared to their more jagged relatives below.  A scraggly bush has pushed its way up through a crack in the rocks.  Small vines weave their way along the ridge, providing a tenuous handhold.

The softly rounded rocks forming the ridge provide for easier climbing compared to their more jagged relatives hidden in darkness below.  A scraggly bush has pushed its way up through a crack in the rocks.  The leaves rustle ominously in the night breeze.  Small vines weave their way along the ridge, providing a tenuous handhold.
